Posts.EditableText:
Try this:

[code:1yzsr6a2]JS.eval ("$('#gamePanes').css('width', '316px')")
JS.eval ("$('#status').css('width', '1048px')")[/code:1yzsr6a2]

It adds an extra 100 pixels to the panes (and to the status bar at the top to keep it aligned).
